<< Contents: Q3. You said that you lost money as a result of being a victim of fraud. Which of the following statements, if any, apply to your experience of being a victim of fraud?
BASE: Those who lost money as a result (at Q1b)
I had to take out an official loan as a result of losing money
Being a victim of fraud also had non-financial impacts on my life (e.g. depression, severe stress, breakdown of relationship)
I had to borrow money from friends and/or family as a result of losing money
I have not financially recovered since losing money through fraud
My credit rating has worsened since I lost money through fraud
